projects.title: Clarity Blog (Website)
projects.desc: Backend/Frontend authentication, account creation and profile customization system for a social media website. Created using MongoDB, Express, Node, and React.

projects.title: Anonymous Chat Site
projects.desc: Used websockets to send text and audio messages to an anonymous global chat room. Created with a Vue frontend, and a Go backend using Gorilla/MUX frameworks.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: This website was created by me over one of my breaks. Created using React and Github Pages.

projects.title: Discord Bot
projects.desc: Using Python, This bot performs a variety of functions including simulating raffles, and querying API data.
